com.persistit

Class StreamLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.persistit.Task
      • com.persistit.StreamLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class StreamLoader
extends Task
    Loads Persistit records from a file or other stream in a format generated by a StreamSaver.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  StreamLoader.ImportHandler
      Handler for various record types in stream being loaded.
